Obsidian Javelin.name: Obsidian Javelin
Obsidian Javelin.flavor: You create a black, ghostly javelin of magical force. Its concussion drives your foe back and makes it a tempting target for your ally.
Obsidian Javelin.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Obsidian Javelin.effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of your next turn gains resist 10 to all damage until the end of that allyâ€™s next turn.

Dictator's Judgment.name: Dictator's Judgment
Dictator's Judgment.flavor: You channel the power of Dictator Andropinis to pronounce a dire judgment on your foe. Your spell roots the target to the spot and crushes its will to resist you, and you offer a bounty of vitality on the head of the damned.
Dictator's Judgment.onHit: 4d8 + ability modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Dictator's Judgment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Dictator's Judgment.effect: The next ally who hits and damages the target before the end of the encounter regains hit points as though he or she had spent three healing surges.

Dustwalk.name: Dustwalk
Dustwalk.flavor: You stride through the air in a whirling cloud of dust.
Dustwalk.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can fly (hover) at your speed. You have an altitude limit of 1 square. You have concealment while flying or hovering.
